input.sentences: my band finally got their first gig !
we talked with our manager and got a location .
the building was old and unique | we were excited to play their .
and lucky for us it was within walking distance of everybody 's house .
when we got inside we were surprised to see all the stuff that was left in there .
output.sentences: The band finally got a gig.
The manager talked about the location of the gig.
They were excited about the unique style of the building they would play in.
One of the band members got off the bike and began to walk thinking in his mind how lucky he was.
After their gig this was all the stuff left on stage which made the manager surprised.
